title: Prohibits possession of certain condoms as evidence
summary: Provides that possession of a condom may not be received in evidence in any trial, hearing or proceeding as evidence of prostitution, patronizing a prostitute, promoting prostitution, permitting prostitution, maintaining a premises for prostitution, lewdness or assignation, or maintaining a bawdy house.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules and the criminal procedure law, in relation to the use in evidence of the fact of possession of a condom
